short_summary: Window cleaning services to be performed at Garrison Petawawa.
description: The Department of National Defence, Garrison Petawawa, Real Property Operations Unit Detachment (RPOU DET) requires a three (3) year Standing Offer to supply all supervision, labour, materials, tools, transportation and equipment necessary to perform Window Cleaning Services on an as and when requested basis to Real Property Operations (RP Ops) at Garrison Petawawa.",
full_summary:
**Notice ID:** W6889-230152

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Project Title:** Window Cleaning Services for Department of National Defence

**Notice Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites bidders to submit a proposal for a three (3) year Standing Offer to provide Window Cleaning Services to the Department of National Defence, specifically at the Garrison Petawawa Real Property Operations Unit.

**Scope of Services:**

The required services include supervision, labour, materials, tools, transportation, and equipment necessary to perform Window Cleaning Services on an "as and when requested" basis. The successful bidder will be required to comply with each mandatory technical criteria and deliverables specified in the Notice of Intent.

**Mandatory Site Visit:**

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for July 13th, 2023, at 10:00 am EST at Building S-111, Room B-104, CFB Petawawa. All bidders must submit requisite documentation for reliable Security Clearance one week prior to the visit.

**Bid Submission and Evaluation:**

The proposal must be submitted on or before July 28th, 2023, by 2:00 pm EDT. Bidders attending the mandatory site visit and submitting the required documents will only be eligible to bid. Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria stipulated in the Notice of Intent.

**Address for Service:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

Christopher Harvey
Department of Public Works and Government Services
christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**

*http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16609851?extsite=MTY2MDk4NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==*

**Attachments:**

None.
